sources.title: The Mysterious Dr. Fu Manchu (1929) WARNER OLANDüçï FULL HD MOVIE
sources.description:
It's Friday @PizzaFLIX

Director: Rowland V. Lee
Writer: Sax Rohmer (Story by)
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLmHgXUJMN1TXEBMtSqYpWfok-xg95KXao
üçïTHE 1st FILM APPEARANCE of DR. FU MANCHUüçï
Step into the shadowy world of early Hollywood mystery with a pre-Code thriller from Paramount Pictures. Directed by Rowland V. Lee, this atmospheric crime drama introduces the infamous Dr. Fu Manchu in his first feature-film appearance. 

Set against a backdrop of vengeance and intrigue, the story follows the diabolical doctor as he seeks retribution for the death of his family during the Boxer Rebellion.

Featuring a chilling performance by Warner Oland as Dr. Fu Manchu, the film also stars Neil Hamilton, Jean Arthur, and William Austin. With its suspenseful narrative and moody cinematography, this film captures the eerie allure of late 1920s mystery cinema.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

Discover the origins of one of pulp fiction‚Äôs most enduring villains in this historic entry in the Fu Manchu saga. A must-watch for fans of classic crime films and early Hollywood sound features.

üçï Be sure to LIKE, COMMENT, and SUBSCRIBE for more rare, vintage films every Friday on PizzaFLIX.

#TheMysteriousDrFuManchu #fullMovie #FuManchu #ClassicMovies #WarnerOland #JeanArthur #NeilHamilton #ParamountPictures #PreCodeHollywood #OldHollywoodMystery#Friday@PizzaFLIX #pizzaflix

metadata.Plot: During the Boxer Rebellion in China during the early 20th century, in which a Chinese secret society attacked all westerners and anyone who associated with them, Dr. Fu Manchu's wife and child are killed by foreigners. Enraged, he vows to take his revenge on the British army officers he holds responsible for the killings.
metadata.Writer: Sax Rohmer, Florence Ryerson, Lloyd Corrigan
metadata.Actors: Warner Oland, Neil Hamilton, Jean Arthur
